title: OS Integration & Q1 Release
goal: Complete OS integration features and release Phase 3 Q1 desktop app

tasks.title: Implement native print dialog
tasks.description: Create native print integration using Electron's print API with system print dialog

tasks.title: Create PDF to printer output
tasks.description: Implement direct PDF printing to system printer with correct formatting

tasks.title: Implement shell integration
tasks.description: Add Show in Folder, Open in Default App, and Reveal in File Manager features
acceptanceCriteria: Show in Folder opens file manager

tasks.title: Create protocol handler registration
tasks.description: Register paperflow:// protocol for deep linking to open files and specific features
acceptanceCriteria: Works on Windows, macOS, and Linux

tasks.title: Implement startup with OS
tasks.description: Add option to launch app when user logs in to OS
acceptanceCriteria: Launch at startup toggle is available
App starts minimized option is available
Works on Windows, macOS, and Linux

tasks.title: Create native dialogs
tasks.description: Implement native message boxes, error dialogs, and confirmation dialogs

tasks.title: Implement clipboard operations
tasks.description: Enable native clipboard operations for images and formatted text
acceptanceCriteria: Copy PDF page as image works
Copy selected text with formatting works

tasks.title: Create power save blocker
tasks.description: Prevent system sleep during long operations like OCR or large file processing
acceptanceCriteria: Power save blocker is released after operation
User is informed about power save block

tasks.title: Implement secure storage
tasks.description: Use OS keychain/credential store for sensitive data like API keys
acceptanceCriteria: Sensitive data stored in OS keychain

tasks.title: Create crash reporter integration
tasks.description: Set up crash reporting for automatic error collection in production
acceptanceCriteria: Reports are sent to error tracking service

tasks.title: Create E2E tests for desktop features
tasks.description: Write Playwright tests for Electron-specific features
acceptanceCriteria: Menu and shortcuts E2E tests pass

tasks.title: Perform cross-platform testing
tasks.description: Test desktop app on Windows, macOS, and Linux for compatibility

tasks.title: Update version to 3.0.0-alpha.1
tasks.description: Update package.json and all version references for desktop alpha release
acceptanceCriteria: Version shows in app About dialog

tasks.title: Update changelog for v3.0.0-alpha
tasks.description: Document all Phase 3 Q1 changes in CHANGELOG.md
acceptanceCriteria: Migration guide from PWA is included

tasks.title: Create v3.0.0-alpha release notes
tasks.description: Write user-facing release notes highlighting desktop features

tasks.title: Create desktop installation guide
tasks.description: Write comprehensive installation guide for all platforms

tasks.title: Configure CI/CD for desktop builds
tasks.description: Set up GitHub Actions for building and releasing desktop apps
acceptanceCriteria: Builds produce artifacts for all platforms
Release workflow publishes to GitHub Releases

tasks.title: Deploy v3.0.0-alpha release
tasks.description: Create and publish v3.0.0-alpha release with all desktop installers
acceptanceCriteria: Linux AppImage and deb are uploaded

successCriteria: All OS integration features work correctly
v3.0.0-alpha is released on all platforms
dependencies: Sprint 1-5: All previous Q1 sprints must be complete
CI/CD pipeline set up for desktop builds
notes: This is the Q1 release sprint - focus on stability and polish
Cross-platform testing is critical before release
Ensure auto-update works before public release
Monitor crash reports closely after release
